Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30279210] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(NCTC 10788)(MIC=256 μM, MBC=256 μM), MRSA (ATCC 12493)(MIC>512 μM, MBC>512 μM), Enterococcus faecalis(NCTC 12697)(MIC>512 μM, MBC>512 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(NCTC 10418)(MIC=128 μM, MBC=256 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(ATCC 27853)(MIC= μM, MBC= μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(NCTC 1467)(MIC=512 μM, MBC>512 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30279210] 3% hemolysis at 1 μM , 4% hemolysis at 2 μM , 1% hemolysis at 4 μM , 0% hemolysis at 8 μM , 2% hemolysis at 16 μM , 0% hemolysis at 32 μM , 0% hemolysis at 128 μM , 3% hemolysis at 256 μM , 13% hemolysis at 512 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The CD spectra of both peptides shows the pattern of random coil in aqueous solution and a typical α-helix CD spectra in 50% of TFE solution.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans

Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide, Ranatuerin-2PLx, showing therapeutic potential in inhibiting proliferation of cancer cells.
Literature.Author: Chen X, Zhang L, Ma C, Zhang Y, Xi X, Wang L, Zhou M, Burrows JF, Chen T
